title: Brown coal to briquettes
creator_credit: State Electricity Commission of Victoria and Frank Hurley
brief_description: Classroom film showing the manufacture of briquettes at Yallourn and Morwell Victoria. Includes demonstration by models of processes; operation of coal dredges at open cut; crushing and drying of coal; pressing of fine powder into briquettes; transport of finished product to other parts of Victoria.
